description: Overview of treatment options for Bipolar Disorder.

subclasses.name: BD1 Acute Mania
subclasses.description: Detailed information about BD1 Acute Mania treatments for Bipolar Disorder.

drugs.name: Divalproex
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Quetiapine+Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: No controlled trials; however, clinical experience suggests that it is a useful strategy. Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Aripiprazole+Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Did not separate from placebo in those with index mania; no studies available in index depression. Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Risperidone+Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Asenapine+Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Olanzapine
drugs.Notes: Did not separate from placebo on core symptoms of depression.

drugs.name: Carbamazepine
drugs.Notes: Carbamazepine should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Olanzapine+Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: Lithium+DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

drugs.name: ECT
drugs.Notes: Divalproex and Carbamazepine should be used with caution in women of childbearing age.

subclasses.name: BD1 Acute Depression
subclasses.description: Detailed information about BD1 Acute Depression treatments for Bipolar Disorder.

drugs.name: Lurasidone+Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Divalproex
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Carbamazepine
drugs.Notes: Carbamazepine should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

subclasses.name: BD1 Maintenance
subclasses.description: Detailed information about BD1 Maintenance treatments for Bipolar Disorder.

drugs.name: Divalproex
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Quetiapine + Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Aripiprazole + Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Carbamazepine
drugs.Notes: Carbamazepine should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Lurasidone + Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Ziprazidone + Li/DVP
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

subclasses.name: BD2 Depression
subclasses.description: Detailed information about BD2 Depression treatments for Bipolar Disorder.

drugs.name: Sertraline
drugs.Notes: For patients with pure depression (non-mixed).

drugs.name: Venlafaxine
drugs.Notes: For patients with pure depression (non-mixed).

drugs.name: Divaloproex
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Fluoxetine
drugs.Notes: For patients with pure depression (non-mixed).

drugs.name: Ziprasidone
drugs.Notes: For patients with depression and mixed hypomania.

subclasses.name: BD2 Maintenance
subclasses.description: Detailed information about BD2 Maintenance treatments for Bipolar Disorder.

drugs.name: Carbamazepine
drugs.Notes: Carbamazepine should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Divalproex
drugs.Notes: Divalproex should be used with caution in women of child bearing age.

drugs.name: Risperidone
drugs.Notes: Primarily for prevention of hypomania
